title: The Rookie’s Mekia Cox: Hunt for Serial Killer Is ‘Definitely One of the Darker’ Storylines for Nyla
description: Ahead of Season 7, The Rookie showrunner Alexi Hawley assured TVLine that fresh drama was headed Detective Nyla Harper’s way. Well, as you may have surmised coming out of the latest episode, which left Nyla temporarily paralyzed, “We are at that point,” cast member Mekia Cox declares. “Very much so.” And Cox was very much […]
